title: Gateway Interface Probe
description:
The router admin panel is exposed on a non-standard port.

Objective: Scan the gateway for open ports to discover and secure hidden management interfaces.
dialogue: Mira: "I found the router admin panel on a weird port. That could be a backdoor!"
Mira: "Can you help me scan the gateway for open ports and secure any hidden management interfaces?"
hints: Probe the gateway across high-value ports.
